name: RockDude (itch)
description:
Watch Gameplay VIDEO

Do you like rocks? Do you like climbing rocks? Do not like broken bones? Then RockDude might be the game for you!

The focus is all about the platforming and setting the player free to go "extreme" Rock-Climbing and explore the large and open 2D environments.
The gameplay centers around the ability to grab onto any surface with your "extreme" climbing axes. we want the player to have a lot of freedom in traversing the mountain however they like. You can quickly scale a shear cliff, as well as climb the underside of any platform.
You can also gain new abilities, like the scuba gear, explosives, and wingsuit, which lets you glide about the mountains.

Hone your skills with all the abilities to take on the games many challenges and collectables to seek out.

  Tip: gamepad highly recommended! Analog sticks don't work. D-pad FTW!

  • Screen Resolution: 1280x720
  • Windows 7 ONLY
